definition: Human review and correction of machine-generated translations, ranging from light editing for fluency to full revision for quality

positive_examples: Post-editing corrected the MT output's word order errors while preserving acceptable phrasings.
Light MTPE fixed obvious errors; full post-editing revised for publication quality.
Post-editing identified that the MT system consistently mistranslated the domain term.
The post-editor's changes focused on naturalness while accepting the MT's accurate content words.
training_hints.disambiguation: Systematic human correction of MT output
